Text: Letter of Understanding Project is a revised blacklined draft of the letter of understanding incorporating Shonnies changes Also attached is a clean copy Hal Haltom LetterofDOC BL LOUdoc

Project Purchase and Sale Agreement Cc you review is a first draft of a Purchase and Sale Agreement for Project At the request of Northern Border this draft was based on the Purchase and Sale Agreement used by Northern Border and Enron to purchase the Big Horn membership interests Since the Big Horn agreement was not executed until the closing it does not include any closing conditions and certain other closing mechanics Because the letter of intent for Project identifies several issues that will require further negotiation with Northern Border I assumed we would follow the same approach for this transaction and negotiate those issues with Northern Border and then execute the Purchase and Sale Agreement at the closing If Northern Border now wishes to execute the Purchase and Sale Agreement before closing we will need to complete our negotiations of the open issues and add the appropriate preclosing provisions to this draft including closing conditions Please call me with your comments to this draft Thanks Hal HOUDOC

Revised Purchase and Sale Agreement Cc a revised draft of the Purchase and Sale Agreement incorporating the closing mechanics we discussed Also attached is a clean copy Please send me your comments to this draft Hal BighornPDOC BL ENA PSAdoc

Purchase and Sale Agreement Draft Cc request of Shonnie Daniel attached is a first draft of a Purchase and Sale Agreement for the sale of the membership interests in Enron Midstream Services LLC ECT Wind River LLC and ECT Powder River LLC This draft has not been fully reviewed by ENA and is subject to any additional comments they may have Hal Haltom Andrews Kurth LLP Travis Street Houston Texas HOUDOC
Blacklined Purchase and Sale Agreementis a blacklined copy of the draft of the Purchase and Sale Agreement that was distributed yesterday Hal BL ENA PSAdoc

Exhibits to Purchase and Sale Agreement Cc your review are drafts of the following exhibits to the Purchase and Sale Agreement Exhibit F Assignment and Assumption Agreement Exhibit G Sellers Officers Certificate Exhibit H Guarantee Agreement Exhibit I Purchasers Officers Certificate Please send me your comments to these drafts Thanks Hal HOUDOC HOUDOC HOUDOC HOUDOC
